summary: A Two-Handed Sword used by ancient Vigoorian Berserkers. Due to its weight the power of this blade is powerful.
descriptionHtml:
Ninja Gaiden's "Dabilahro" Comes to SKYRIM!

A Two-Handed Sword used by ancient Vigoorian Berserkers. Due to its weight the power of this blade is powerful.

Recipe:

1 Daedra Heart
1 Ruby Gem
1 Steel Ingot
2 Dwarven Ingots

Tempering Recipe:

1 Ruby Gem
1 Dwarven Ingot

Stats:

Weight: 25
Reach 1.4
Speed 0.6
Damage: 24
Crit Dmg: 10

Craft it on the MISC section but sometimes with different people it shows in other places (not my problem because I can't replicate the issue and fix it).

I will not change the crafting recipe because of how people lazy get.

GET THE ITEMS AND CRAFT IT OR DON'T DOWNLOAD.
author: Quechus13
